url.default: The canonical URL of the article page.

keywords.description: Keywords or tags used to describe this content. Multiple entries in a keywords list are typically delimited by commas.

images.description: The images URLs that is representative of the article or AMP story.

datePublished.description: The date and time the article was first published, in ISO 8601 format.

dateModified.description: The date and time the article was most recently modified, in ISO 8601 format.

authorType.description: The type of author for this article.

description.description: A short description of the article.

publisherLogo.description: The url of the publisher logo.

posts.description: A posting that is part of this blog.

datePublished.description: The date and time the article was first published, in ISO 8601 format. Best practices: - The date shouldn't change over time. - We recommend including the hour information in addition to the day in the timestamp. - The value for dateModified should be more recent than the value for datePublished.

image.description: An image URL that is representative of the blog post.

anyOf.description: The International Standard Serial Number (ISSN) that identifies this serial publication. You can repeat this property to identify different formats of, or the linking ISSN (ISSN-L) for, this serial publication.

items.description: The International Standard Serial Number (ISSN) that identifies this serial publication. You can repeat this property to identify different formats of, or the linking ISSN (ISSN-L) for, this serial publication.
